Label: Description
Value: Latest COD population statistics compiled at the admin level. The CSV files contain subnational p-codes, their corresponding administrative names, source organization, and reference dates where available. These are constructed from individual country level population files, which can be found using this search on HDX.

Label: Define Methodology
Value: Compiled daily from individual COD population statistics files. Please refer to the [source datasets](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/?dataseries_name=COD+-+Subnational+Population+Statistics) to learn more about their specific methodologies.

Label: Caveats/Comments
Value: This dataset is refreshed daily, but the source datasets have different update schedules. Please refer to the [source datasets](https://data.humdata.org/dataset/?dataseries_name=COD+-+Subnational+Population+Statistics) to verify their specific update frequency.

Label: Tags
